column5: Relaxing escape located on Lake Travis in Lago Vista/Point Venture in Texas. We are located about one hour from downtown Austin and the Bergstrom International Airport. Our three story lake house is perfect for a family week long vacation or a weekend to cool down, take a break and recharge on the lake which is just behind the house, a few steps away.
column8: Lakefront, Sleeps up to 12, Water Access! Views!
